articles.author: WCNC Charlotte
articles.title: Body found in landing gear of American Airlines plane in Charlotte - WRAL.com
articles.description: A stowaway was found dead in the landing gear of an American Airlines aircraft that had recently arrived from Europe, WCNC Charlotte reports.
articles.content:
A stowaway was found dead in the landing gear of an American Airlines aircraft that had recently arrived from Europe, WCNC Charlotte reports.

articles.author: John Silk
articles.title: Denmark bans civil drones after more sightings - DW
articles.description: Denmark is closing its entire airspace to civilian drones. The ban comes as the Nordic country prepares to host European leaders after a flurry of suspicious drone activity in recent days.
articles.content: Denmark on Sunday ordered a ban on civil drone flights, after several unmanned aerial vehicles were witnessed at military facilities overnight, following a week in which drone sorties caused the temp… [+1935 chars]
